text: Ezɨ Kenania, me Atatɨn itir gumazamizir kabar gari, me aghuimazimɨn ikiava azima, me kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Isipia aghuimazimɨn ikia azirakar ekiam gami.” Kamaghɨn me danganir kam dɨbora ghaze, “Abel Misraim.” Ezɨ danganir kam, a Jordanɨn Fanemɨn, aruem anadi naghɨn iti.50:11 Hibrun akamɨn, ziar kam, “Abel Misraim,” an mɨngarim kamakɨn, “Isipia aziava arai.”
